name: blaseball
description: A libray for interacting with the blaseball api

scripts.patch: npm version patch && git checkout master && git rebase dev && git push && git checkout dev && git push
scripts.minor: npm version minor && git checkout master && git rebase dev && git push && git checkout dev && git push
scripts.major: npm version major && git checkout master && git rebase dev && git push && git checkout dev && git push
